soiea.title: SoIEA: Social Implicit Emotion Analysis (Ongoing)
soiea.desc_1: Developing an advanced version of the ViISA project to analyze implicit emotions in dynamic social media contexts, specifically YouTube.
soiea.desc_2: Engineering a new data pipeline to crawl and process comments from a curated dataset of over 500 Vietnamese YouTube channels.
soiea.desc_3: The current focus is training and benchmarking models on this new, large-scale YouTube comment dataset.
soiea.desc_4: The ultimate goal is to expand the system for real-time implicit emotion prediction during YouTube livestreams.

viisa.title: ViISA: A Novel Benchmark for Implicit Sentiment Analysis in Vietnamese
viisa.desc_1: Principal creator of the ViISA dataset (Hugging Face: HiAmNear/ViISA), a novel resource for Vietnamese implicit emotion analysis.
viisa.desc_2: Engineered a data pipeline to crawl news articles (tuoitre.com), perform semantic chunking (using underthesea), and filter candidates.
viisa.desc_3: Developed a multi-stage, AI-assisted labeling workflow utilizing LLMs (e.g., GPT-4, Gemini-Flash) to annotate 9,000+ data samples.
viisa.desc_4: Validated annotation quality and inter-annotator agreement using the Cohen's Kappa statistic before large-scale labeling.
viisa.desc_5: Benchmarked a suite of models (from BiLSTM to PhoBERT) on the dataset, evaluating performance using key metrics like Macro F1 (MF1), Weighted F1 (WF1), and Accuracy.
viisa.desc_6: This research was formalized as a manuscript and underwent the initial review process at the AAAI 2025 Conference.
